name: Helper
description: Shows help for all tools listed in the app. A quick guide to understand what each tool does.

name: YouTube Downloader
description: Download YouTube videos or audios in different resolutions and formats directly to your PC.

name: PDF Editor
description: Replace specific text inside PDF files with precise formatting. Includes preview, undo/redo, and manual save.

name: PDF Merger
description: Merge multiple PDFs into a single file. Drag and drop to reorder before merging.

name: Image to PDF
description: Convert one or more images into a clean, properly sized PDF file. Supports JPEG, PNG, etc.

name: Dummy File Generator
description: Quickly generate test files (PDF, TXT, Excel, etc.) with dummy content for dev/testing purposes.

name: Download Sorter
description: Automatically sorts your Downloads folder by file type (images, docs, videos, etc.) into subfolders.

name: PDF Summarizer
description: Summarizes long PDF files using offline AI (DistilBART). Helps you quickly grasp the key points from docs.
